camera_get_view_x: This function can be used to retrieve the x position of the view for a given camera. Note that this function is only valid for cameras created using camera_create_view() or for those added in the room editor.
The unique camera ID value returned when you created the camera

{ANY_CODE} var vx = camera_get_view_x(view_camera[0]);
var vy = camera_get_view_y(view_camera[0]);
draw_text(vx + 5, vy + 5, "SCORE" + string(score));
The above code retrieves the position of the camera assigned to view port[0] and then draws text relative to that position.
